Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (G) on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,976,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Roger Clemens (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1985, off Chris Codiroli (OAK)...
Injured on 6/18/1985 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 9-10 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 9/28/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/5/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $8,111,111 per year...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1988...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/13/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $1,100,000 per year...
Traded from Toronto to Cincinnati on 2/14/1991 (Going to CIN: C Lance Parrish. Going to TOR: 3B Tom Foley)...
Released by Cincinnati on 2/14/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/3/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $7,604,167 per year...
Released by Boston on 3/4/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/4/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $1,100,000 per year...
Traded from Chicago to Toronto on 3/4/1991 (Going to CHC: P Jeff Barkley. Going to TOR: C Lance Parrish, P Jeff Schwarz)...
Released by Toronto on 4/26/1991...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/26/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $1,800,000 per year...
